mapper.insert: insert into information(title, content, authors, release_time, category, category_name, notes) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{authors}, #{releaseTime}, #{category}, #{categoryName}, #{notes})
insert into information(title, authors, content, release_time, category, category_name) values (#{title}, #{authors}, #{content}, #{release_time}, #{category}, #{category_name})
mapper.update: update information set title = #{title}, authors = #{authors}, content = #{content}, release_time = #{releaseTime}, category = #{category}, category_name = #{categoryName} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from information order by release_time desc limit #{start},#{offset}
